title: (05268) Santa Cruz de Pinares -

Without services, located in the middle of nature, forbidden to use barbecues. A place 1.5 km from a town, Santa Cruz de Pinares, in the province of Ávila. You have to go along a wide gravel road, which you take on the outskirts of town, where the Santa Cruz de Pinares sign is, see photo. They can park about 4 motorhomes. Place with beautiful views and a Water Dam less than 500 m away. where fishing is practiced, with total tranquility. In the town you have a shop, open in the morning, and two bars.
Many trails with impressive landscapes, to be able to walk and enjoy nature.

Access is complicated for motorhomes but small vans climb the slopes for sure. It is not an area that has any services, so you have to be especially careful with cleaning so that access is not prohibited. You can also visit a beautiful waterfall and an abandoned hydroelectric plant that supplied Ávila. It is a parking lot with beautiful views at sunset and a lot of tranquility.

Arriving on the road, you will find horses, cows, goats and sheep almost everywhere! The area has well-done loading and unloading (50 cents for 150 liters of water and 20 cents for unloading the toilet), separate waste collection, column for four electrical connections (payment by card, contactless, of 2 euros for 24 hours of supply ), free access to municipal wifi and video surveillance! The stalls are slightly sloping, which can be solved with wedges. The village is certainly worth a visit, there is also a train station nearby, if you want to move around Madrid, from here it is very simple and safe for your vehicle. Only applause!

The pool restaurant is open out of season and is very good. If you have a bulky vehicle, it is better to access from Sotillo to avoid crossing the town center with its narrow streets. Without shadow.

title: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 159 Calle Sebastián el Cano
title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 159 Calle Sebastián el Cano
description: Beach by the lake, near Madrid. No facilities, but magnificent "wild camping”.

title: (05430) La Adrada - 24 Urbanización Bellas Vistas
description: Ideal place to spend a day next to the natural pools of the Adrada, without services but with shade. Very quiet place to sleep, there is a beach bar

title: (05428) Casillas - M-549
description: Drinking water source in children's area. No hose possible, only filling of bottles and carafes.

title: (05430) La Adrada - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the municipal swimming pool of La Adrada. Quiet, shady and fairly level place. The municipal swimming pool has good facilities and a snack bar.

title: (05239) Peguerinos - 49 Peñas Blancas
description: Small parking on the side of the road that gives access to the Peguerinos campsite and the Abantos high. It is next to the road but it is quiet. Helpful and welcoming people. Nice mountain routes in the area.

title: (05239) Peguerinos - Calle Villa
description: Parking in front of the lake in the middle of nature, an inhabitant of the closest town, Peguerinos, told me. Very quiet place. There are 2 "parkings" when you follow the path, both the same.

title: (28297) Santa María de la Alameda - M-535
title_short: (28297) Santa María de la Alameda - M-535
description: Very quiet night on a large empty car park with views of the stars.

title: (05123) Hoyocasero - AV-905
description: In the middle of the forest. Most of the parking space is on a slope. Two parking areas above (not recommended for high vans) and below (several Coaches can enter). Many tables, barbecue area and fountain. If it has rained a lot, access may be difficult. Very calm

title: (05239) Peguerinos -
description: Quiet place in the middle of nature, right in front of the swamp to take a morning dip. The access road is not paved and is two-way, there are several entrances to park. It is important to mention that the road does not surround the entire reservoir and that it is not recommended for very low vehicles.

title: (05310) Fontiveros - 61 Travesía Concentración Parcelar
description: Fontiveros (Ávila), an emblematic place in the "La Moraña" region. Cradle of the mystic and poet San Juan de la Cruz. New service area but without black water (toilet) emptying, with motorhome P without shadows but lightning. Health Center with 24-h emergency, Guardia Covil office, pharmacy, supermarkets and other shops, ATMs and bank, bars and restaurants, hairdressers, petrol station. Places to visit: Birthplace of San Juan de la Cruz, Church of San Cipriano (BIC), Laguna Grande, Hermitage of Santa Ana, Parque de los Chorrillos,... Impressive sunrises and sunsets. kind and friendly people.

title: (05450) Casavieja - 0 Paraje Charco las Cabras
description: Recreational area Fuentehelecha. Without services source of spring, deposits can not be filled. beautiful area surrounded by forests and with routes. In front of the camping of casavieja

name: Camping Casavieja
title: (05400) Camping Casavieja
description: Family-friendly campsite ... very quiet, wide recreational meadows, hiking trails, with a large pool included and close to a swimming area in the natural gorge

title: (05430) La Adrada - 2 Urbanización el Cauce 2 Fase
title_short: (05430) La Adrada - 2 Urbanización el Cauce 2 Fase
description: Space used as parking for the 101 gladiators mountain bike race. In general, quite flat, a little caution at the entrance due to the ruts formed by the rains, but without any problem. Bakery, restaurants, services 10 min walk. without services, only a water source at the entrance.

title: (05369) Narros del Castillo - 21 AV-P-627
description:
Rural area recently inaugurated, quiet and close to the highway. In the village, there is a shop.
Taps in working order, also a handy weight bridge, only 30 cents, self service.

name: Área de Autocaravanas de La Adrada
title: (05430) Área de Autocaravanas de La Adrada
title_short: (05430) Área de Autocaravanas de La Adrada
description: Municipal area. Visits and walks in the surroundings. The castle that is built around and on top of a church of which its head and part of the side walls remain. It is currently the interpretation center. Herrerian style church. La Adrada preserves 5 bridges that constitute an important architectural heritage.

title: (28294) La Estación - 289 Calle Francisco de Zurbaran
title_short: (28294) La Estación - 289 Calle Francisco de Zurbaran
description: Public parking, level dirt floor, ample for ACs. Next to the train station to go to Ávila, Madrid, El Escorial, ... Very friendly town. Formerly there was a water source nearby. In summer there are some small shops.

title: (05461) Mijares - AV-901
description: Small space of land next to the road that goes up to the port of Mijares, in the El Horcajo recreational area, with a fresh water basin that comes down from the mountains (untreated), a recreational area with several tables and benches on both sides of the closed road and barbecues.

title: (05239) Peguerinos - Camino de los Rajuelos
description: La Nava Recreational Area, next to the Campings. Little mobile coverage. Spacious, level, without services, only with fountain and barbecues to use except the summer months. Quiet at night but very popular during the day on weekends. Nice place and with hiking trails.

title: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 1 Plaza del Pilar
title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 1 Plaza del Pilar
description: Self-service laundry. Property of Hostal Plaza del Pilar. Open from 7 a.m.

title: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 7 Travesia Garbanzal
title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 7 Travesia Garbanzal
description: Parking next to the bullring of San Martin de Valdeiglesias, urban surrounding.

name: Camping La Nava
title: (05239) Camping La Nava
description:
Very large campsite with free pitches. Very quiet even on weekends. A few permanent caravans. Friendly welcome. Internet only by wifi at the bar. No network in the campsite.
Much quieter than the Enmedio campsite next door. No swimming pool.

address.street: Carretera de Peguerinos- Alto del León KM 3600

title: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 305 Avenida de la Costa de Madrid
title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 305 Avenida de la Costa de Madrid
description: Parking 20 minutes walk from the reservoir

address.street: 305 Avenida de la Costa de Madrid

title: (40464) Martín Muñoz de las Posadas - 116 N-601
title_short: (40464) Martín Muñoz de las Posadas - 116 N-601
description: Perfect for spending the night. Gas station with showers, watch out for COVID-19 and a bar-restaurant where you can eat anything with good service.

name: Camping Valle Enmedio
title: (05239) Camping Valle Enmedio
description: Valle de enmedio campsite, an excellent place to hike through the Sierra de Guadarrama natural park. spacious pitches, some with some unevenness.

title: (40400) El Espinar - Unnamed Road
description: A very quiet place with beautiful views. There is a source of drinking water nearby.Night prohibited

title: (05115) Serranillos - AV-913
description: A very quiet place, very beautiful, ideal for a rest in the middle of nature

title: (28294) Robledo de Chavela - 16 Paseo de la Antigua
title_short: (28294) Robledo de Chavela - 16 Paseo de la Antigua
description: Just behind the Unide Supermarket that has butane and propane gas cylinders. Quite large and level esplanade in the same town, ideal for visiting the mountain and its monuments. Garbage cans at the entrance. Ideal for stocking up at the supermarket.

title: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 6 Camino de Marañones
title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 6 Camino de Marañones
description: Located in the earthen car park of the Enchanted Forest of San Martin de Valdeiglesias. calm

title: (05461) Mijares - 2 Calle Llanillo Chillon
description: Parking of the natural pool of Mijares, dirt and very uneven. Maybe for one or two vans on the flat at the most. Natural pool of fresh water with bathrooms. Bar right next door. In the same town of Mijares. Area with 3 or 4 tables to eat next to the bar, the pool and the parking lot.

title: (28294) Robledo de Chavela - 13 Paseo del Cerro
title_short: (28294) Robledo de Chavela - 13 Paseo del Cerro
description: Picnic area, to stop to eat and see the town

title: (28649) Rozas de Puerto Real - M-507
description: Parking to spend the night, it has a playground, swimming pool, paddle tennis, it is next to a cafeteria, restaurant and to the fairgrounds where they do many activities. The parking lot is next to the road but you don't hear a lot of noise, there are flat spaces and others that are inclined.

title: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - Camino de San Martín de Valdeiglesias a Navas del Marqués
title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - Camino de San Martín de Valdeiglesias a Navas del Marqués
description: Viewpoint over the swamp. Difficult access

address.street: Camino de San Martín de Valdeiglesias a Navas del Marqués

title: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - Unnamed Road
title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - Unnamed Road
description: Parking, quiet, with good shade, access by road that something complicated for motorhome but it van well. To access the marshes is that lower by a road and in 5 minutes we are there!

title: (05132) San Martín del Pimpollar - N-502
description: Spectacular place next to a river. You can bathe in good weather. There are more sidings next to this, following the river, Restaurant nearby

title: (40410) El Espinar - 13 Paseo Quintana
description: Very quiet parking next to a river and with nature. you can walk to town

title: (05461) Mijares - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with drinking water and tables, garbage cans and swings. Quiet and shady place.

title: (05420) Sotillo de la Adrada - AV-915
description: Private area. "Viruta's Área" open day and night. electricity, very quiet. 800 meters from the village, at the gate of the Tietar valley.

title: (05450) Casavieja - 3 Conjunto S1/ Cm Campo de Futbol
title_short: (05450) Casavieja - 3 Conjunto S1/ Cm Campo de Futbol
description: Large esplanade of land and grass with some gravel on the outskirts of the town, with hardly any car traffic, there is a fountain with a screw tap but it says that until further notice it is out of service

address.street: 3 Conjunto S1/ Cm Campo de Futbol

title: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - Carretera del Pantano
title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - Carretera del Pantano
description: Parking at the edge of the San Juan water reservoir, good access, several locations along the way, probably crowded in summer and less quiet; bars and restaurants nearby, surrounded by nature and water where it is possible to swim.

name: Camping La Ardilla Roja
title: (28696) Camping La Ardilla Roja
description: CAMPING LA ARDILLA ROJA It also offers bungalows and mobile -homes. It has a cafeteria, bathrooms with showers, laundry, swimming pool, activities, ... Very quiet place next to the San Juan reservoir. Very friendly and helpful staff.

title: (28294) Robledo de Chavela - Camino de la Ermita
title_short: (28294) Robledo de Chavela - Camino de la Ermita
description: Quiet area next to the hermitage of Navahonda. In a very pleasant holm oak forest to spend a night or a field day. Without services The access trail is dirt, but without bumps.

title: (05460) Gavilanes - Unnamed Road
description: Large parking lot for football field and below the cemetery easy access beautiful view

title: (05132) San Martín del Pimpollar - N-502
description: Small roadside parking, with a source of water flowing very hard, perfect for filling water cans. We did not sleep there.

title: (28640) Cadalso de los Vidrios - 108 Calle San Antón
title_short: (28640) Cadalso de los Vidrios - 108 Calle San Antón
description: Online parking at the end of a paved road near the Camino de Santiago pass. Very quiet and close to the town with all services. Easy maneuverability

name: Camping Monasterio de Pelayos
title: (28696) Camping Monasterio de Pelayos
description: Camping enfermeria, there are pitches for tents. Location of the mobile home, bungalows, caravan, land, house bar-restaurant and shop.

title: (28294) -
description: Madrid NASA Space Station Parking.

title: (28680) Pelayos de la Presa -
description: Super spot beautiful view no noise not a single pass access van 4/2 and van

title: (40445) Juarros de Voltoya - SG-V-3214
description: A very cool place to spend the afternoon with the family, fishing, taking a walk ... I do not recommend it for bathing.

title: (05412) San Esteban del Valle - AV-913
description: A beautiful place to park for a night. At the top of a mountain pass with wonderful views down two valleys. There is a fuente/spring about 100m away for unlimited drinking water. Also numerous amazing hikes starting at the parking place.

title: (05412) San Esteban del Valle - AV-913
description: Drinking water, easy access

title: (28695) Navas del Rey - 38 Calle Embalse de San Juan
title_short: (28695) Navas del Rey - 38 Calle Embalse de San Juan
description: You can stay overnight

title: (28640) Cadalso de los Vidrios -
description: Car park sector lanchón de los oxyes- quiet area to spend the night. Very close to the town, the area does not have a water source. From this point you can do the Peña Muñana route.

title: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 3 Diseminado Camino Ferrocarril
title_short: (28680) San Martín de Valdeiglesias - 3 Diseminado Camino Ferrocarril
description: Parking area to spend a great day in an environment of nature, with the beach to swim and tables to eat, a lot of shade, forbidden to camp, but quiet bivouac tolerated. if you can not find any place you can go to the opposite bank because the area is even flatter.

title: (40466) Martín Muñoz de la Dehesa - A-6 Autovía del Noroeste
title_short: (40466) Martín Muñoz de la Dehesa - A-6 Autovía del Noroeste
description: GALP gas station with cafeteria. The most remarkable thing is that it has a free shower for customers in the bathroom area.

title: (05460) Gavilanes - 1 Avenida Pedro Bernardo
description: Bathroom area with tables and some shade, we did not sleep because we needed mobile coverage and we did not have it,

title: (05200) Arévalo - 123 Avenida Severo Ochoa
description: Quiet place for the night. Health center open day and night. Parking possible if discreet

title: (05200) Arévalo - 12 Avenida de Emilio Romero
description: Laundry open Monday to Sunday. From 8AM till 10PM

title: (05370) Flores de Ávila - 4 Calle Azucena
description: Right at the entrance of the town there is a large esplanade to park motorhome, camper etc. for free. It is a very safe and quiet place to spend the night where there are only friendly local people. There is a pool with a small bar that opens only in summer. The pool has showers and there is a paddle tennis court and a playground for children.

title: (45633) La Iglesuela del Tiétar -
description: Flat area by the river

title: (05200) Arévalo - 2 Travesia Foronda
description: Next to the mill (inhabited and also now managed by the town hall for courses and hydrographic matters; it is advisable to be discreet). There is a 220v plug. There is only flat space for a small/medium camper. Steep and narrow descent. Very calm.

title: (05413) Villarejo del Valle - N-502
description: Parking on the ground with very good views and wifi in the restaurant: a cafe with views.

title: (05413) Villarejo del Valle -
description: Just 100m before the pass, on the left, you can stop to refuel, it is not stipulated that the water is not drinkable, and the tap has a good flow ...

title: (05200) Arévalo - CL-605
description: Drinking water source. Shady benches. Hermitage of the virgin of the walk.

title: (05200) Arévalo - 48 Calle Santa María al Picote
title_short: (05200) Arévalo - 48 Calle Santa María al Picote
description: It is possible to spend the night. Very calm. There is a source and a playground for children.

title: (40449) Balisa - 5 Plaza Mayor
description: Quiet village with free parking for day and night. You can refill the water in a fountain that you have in the square. The bar has low prices and they made us an excellent Spanish potato omelet. I think they only open on weekends.

title: (45633) La Iglesuela del Tiétar - 56 Calle Ejido
title_short: (45633) La Iglesuela del Tiétar - 56 Calle Ejido
description: Wooded parking area at the entrance to the town. water fountain not treated

title: (28695) Navas del Rey - Unnamed Road
description: Old railway at the foot of the reservoir of Picadas, very quiet for the night, difficult access by road very sloping and riddled with rain, we came down with a vehicle of 7 p.

title: (05414) Villarejo del Valle -
description: Beautiful location up in the hills next to a ‘recreation area’, a few tables and benches. Great views of the mountains. A fountain for drinking water. Very quiet, just the sound of the birds. You drive past the other parking area and continue on a rough dirt road for perhaps 600m. It was ok for our 6m motorhome but not suitable for bigger vehicles. Friendly farmer recommended the location. Space for more than two vehicles only if travelling together.

title: (45900) Almorox - 36 M-507
description: Parking of the Pinar de Almorox Start of the 3,400 km route Parking of the Pinar de Almorox. Start circular route of 3.4km Place to spend the night very quiet. No services No water

title: (05470) Pedro Bernardo - Unnamed Road
description: Paragliding takeoff parking area. Access is difficult, and I think only suitable for 4x4s.

title: (05413) Cuevas del Valle - Calle Barreras
description: Viewpoint with beautiful views both day and night

title: (05414) Cuevas del Valle - N-502
description: Incredible site. views of the valley (caves of the valley). Little traveled secondary road, no cars pass at night. As it is not in the upper part of the port, it is more sheltered and it is not cold (you go up 15 minutes and it shows). No prohibitions or posters. Spectacular.

title: (05412) San Esteban del Valle Ávila - Unnamed road
title_short: (05412) San Esteban del Valle Ávila - Unnamed road
description: Motorhome area for 5 vehicles. gray, black and recharge. Next to municipal swimming pools with a bar, where they give lunch and dinner. Very quiet next to an urbanization and close to the town.

title: (05200) Arévalo - Unnamed Road
description: Pine wood near the quiet village of Arevalo. A lot of plain points in the way along the forest where you can spend the night.

title: (05412) San Esteban del Valle - 14 AV-922
description: Quiet area for pleasant children and picnic areas. It has a natural pool.
